amendment.description: Amendment strikes the proviso which limits the Urban Areas Security Initiative to the top 10 urban areas by risk.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike language relating to the top 10 highest risk urban areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clarke (MI) amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 273 - 150 (Roll no. 389).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clarke (MI) amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 273 - 150 (Roll no. 389).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Clarke (MI).
